LanguageData.SilverTile.label: 银质地砖
LanguageData.SilverTile.description: Expensive and slow to build. Soft grey tiles with a grey bordering. 美观度： 3。
LanguageData.SterileTile.label: 无菌地砖
LanguageData.SterileTile.description: Sterile tiles are clean, light grey squares. Very useful in hospitals to help prevent infections. Quite slow to build. 美观度： 0。
